title: Region change still off
body: Hey! I have been reading the forums about the region change error, its been more than 6 weeks since that post and im still canÂ´t change region. Hope you can help me.

replies.body: Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we might be able to help. Transfers are still currently being worked out on the backend but there might be something we could do in your ticket ^_^.

There is a [pinned topic](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) for this, and they've been trying to fix it for a while now. They ran into more issues, and changed the expected date to be towards the end of this month, or early next month. When it's available again, there will be a discount.
